name: Escape Room: The Mystery of Everson Manor
description:
ðŸŒ· Discover the mystery of Everson Manor in this fully virtual escape room adventure!


All you need to play this escape room is a duplicate of this file and an internet connection. The average runtime is about an hour, though it depends on how many people you play with and how familiar you are with escape rooms.


If you play this and have any feedback - even just a small note - feel free to send it to me at bit.ly/everson-feedback! I wrote and illustrated this myself and would love to hear your thoughts ðŸ’–


Best of luck and have fun!


[Update 10/22/20: edited instruction text, edited text in Evelyn's toybox, fixed kitchen puzzle typo, fixed case sensitivity issue. Planning for an update soon to clean up naming conventions!]
